GooBit.setRGBLED_RGB: Set RGB LED to custom color using RGB values
GooBit.playTone: Play a tone on the buzzer
GooBit.playNote: Play a note on the buzzer
GooBit.motorRun: Set the direction and speed of GooBit motor
GooBit.motorRunDual: Set motor speed for MA and MB separately
GooBit.enableTrack_setValveValue: Enable or Disable line tracking sensor and set the line tracking sensor valve value
GooBit.tracking: Judging the Current Status of Tracking Module
GooBit.ping: Send a ping and get the echo time
GooBit.connectIrReceiver: Connects to the IR receiver module at the specified pin and configures the IR protocol
GooBit.onIrButton: Do something when a specific button is pressed or released on the remote control
GooBit.irButton: Returns the code of the IR button that was pressed last
GooBit.wasAnyIrButtonPressed: Returns true if any button was pressed since the last call of this function
GooBit.irButtonCode: Returns the command code of a specific IR button
